description: Ceritinib (LDK378), an ALK TKI, was evaluated in the context of crizotinib resistant ALK rearrangement positive non-small cell lung cancers. It was found that Certinib potently overcame crizotinib-resistant mutations. In particular, L1196M, G1269A, I1171T, S1206Y but it was not able to overcome G1202R and F1174C.

is_reported_in.title: Friboulet L, Li N, Katayama R, et al. The ALK inhibitor ceritinib overcomes crizotinib resistance in non-small cell lung cancer. Cancer Discov. 2014;4(6):662-673.
